## InputValidationError.hasFieldError() method

Checks if a specific field has validation errors.

**Signature:**

```typescript
hasFieldError(fieldName: string): boolean;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

fieldName


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

The name of the field to check


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

boolean

True if the field has validation errors

## Example


```typescript
if (validationError.hasFieldError('password')) {
  // Show password error in UI
}
```
